Constructor Detail

FileUtil

public FileUtil(Preferences prefs)
Construct an instance using prefs from caller. Sets the JFileChooser current directory to the last directory saved in the caller's prefs.

Parameters:
prefs - the caller's Preferences
Method Detail

addOpenFileFilter

public void addOpenFileFilter(FileFilter filter)

getFileFromPrefsOrPrompt

public File getFileFromPrefsOrPrompt(String prefsKey,
                                     String prompt,
                                     FileFilter filter,
                                     boolean saveFileSelectedToPrefs)
                              throws IOException
Lookup the file from the prefs, or if it doesn't exist prompt the user via a open file dialog.

Parameters:
prefsKey - key to lookup stored filename.
prompt - prompt message to ask user to select a file.
filter - file filter used in the select file dialog
saveFileSelectedToPrefs - if true save the file selected to the prefs
Returns:
File specified in prefs, or selected in the dialog by user.
Throws:
IOException - if no valid file is selected when prompted.

                                  throws IOException
Convenience method.

Parameters:

Returns:
Throws:

getSaveFileFromPrefsOrPrompt

public File getSaveFileFromPrefsOrPrompt(String prefsKey,
                                         String prompt,
                                         FileFilter filter,
                                         boolean saveFileSelectedToPrefs,
                                         boolean promptForOverwrite)
                                  throws IOException
Lookup the file from the prefs, or if it doesn't exist prompt the user via a open file dialog.

Parameters:
prefsKey - key to lookup stored filename.
prompt - prompt message to ask user to select a file.
filter - file filter used in the select file dialog
saveFileSelectedToPrefs - if true save the file selected to the prefs
promptForOverwrite - prompt user to overwrite if selected file exists
Returns:
File specified in prefs, or selected in the dialog by user.
Throws:
IOException - if no valid file is selected when prompted.

showSaveDialog

public File showSaveDialog(String dialogTitle,
                           Component parent,
                           FileFilter filter)
Show a JFileChooser save file dialog. Saves the directory last navigated to into the preferences.

Parameters:
dialogTitle - file chooser's dialog title
parent - the parent component of the dialog; can be null
filter - the FileFilter to set on the FileChooser
Returns:
selected File, or null if cancel selected.

showOpenDialog

public File showOpenDialog(String dialogTitle,
                           Component parent,
                           FileFilter filter)
Show a JFileChooser open file dialog. Saves the directory last navigated to into the preferences.

Parameters:
dialogTitle - file chooser's dialog title
parent - the parent component of the dialog; can be null
filter - the FileFilter to set on the FileChooser
Returns:
selected File, or null if cancel selected.
